message.body: Aww Megan I'm sorry I didn't text you Earlier bout a plan. I'm working on a group project and trying to finish up but I don't think I can make a concrete plan for evening right now. I'm sorry! But I'll def keep u updated!
Ok no worries! Good luck with the project!
I'm so sorry I'm pissed because I was excited to see you, was planning on going dancing... Might still be able to make dancing interested?

I was excited to see you too but maybe we can go to SOWA and check out that studios/galleries on Sunday afternoon? Keep me posted tonight! I might be going to the Middle East in central square with Alex and some friends later. You should come if you get finished with your project!
